name: Dunken Downhill
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #204.

The theme was downhill.

So I made a rage game.

Story

You are Dunken Downhill. Your life is going downhill. However you have to get your mail. To get it you need to go downhill. And for some unknow reason your, once friendly, neighbors are attacking you.

Controls

You must jump to move.

Space to jump.

A to move left.

D to move right.

Enter to shoot egg (when unlocked).
